Name: Guard Helm
FlavorText: Standard issue for the Town Watch.

Name: Neural Visor
FlavorText: Displays life signs through solid stone.

Name: Tattered Tunic
FlavorText: Smells of sulfur and old blood.

Name: Silk Doublet
FlavorText: Finest silk, grants entry to high society.

Name: Powered Greaves
FlavorText: Servo-motors assist with running and jumping.

Name: Monofiber Blade
FlavorText: Cuts through steel like a hot wire.

Name: Longbow
FlavorText: Yew wood reinforced with carbon strips.

Name: The Overseer Key
FlavorText: Legendary badge that bypasses city security.
